alert.note: Alert for Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 2:17PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CHURCHILL COUNTY THROUGH 300 PM PDT... At 215 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Middlegate, or 24 miles southwest of New Pass Summit, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and areas of blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middlegate, Junction U.S 50 And NV 722, Mount Augusta, and Caroll Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake
